definition: to bring together
to collect/to hoard/to accumulate/to save
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
to save bit by bit/to accumulate
to gather/to assemble
to assemble
to gather closely together
to gather/to assemble
see 眾星捧月|众星捧月[zhong4 xing1 peng3 yue4]

sentences.english: You can save a lot by paying cash.
sentences.chinese: 你付現金，你可以攢好多錢。

sentences.english: It took me a month to scrounge up enough money.
sentences.chinese: 我花了一個月的時間才攢了足夠的錢。

sentences.english: It would take me two years to amass a hundred dollars.
sentences.chinese: 攢一百元錢我需要二年時間。

sentences.english: We never had a lot of money, so every week we'd collect what we had and go to a video arcade.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒太多錢，每個禮拜帶着攢下的錢去遊戲廳。

sentences.english: She has a bit of money saved up from her last temp job.
sentences.chinese: 上次做零工她攢下了一點錢。

sentences.english: Do not do things that save to the cut-off date.
sentences.chinese: 不要把事情攢到截止日期再做。

sentences.english: He is a miser,and has penny-pinched himself out of several millions of US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 他是個吝嗇鬼，剋扣自己而攢下數百萬美元。

sentences.english: I would definitely chase it down the street, a wad of bills clutched in my hand.
sentences.chinese: 我一定會手裏攢一把錢追着他跑。

sentences.english: They had saved for a decade to build the small brick-and-tile home which crashed to the ground in minutes.
sentences.chinese: 他們攢了十年錢蓋的磚瓦結構的房子幾分鐘就崩塌了。

sentences.english: I’m still cleaning my post-vacation backlog of feeds and messages.
sentences.chinese: 長假後攢了一堆待閱內容和信息，掃尾工作還在繼續。

sentences.english: I saved enough money to build a boat and to buy fifty lobster traps;
sentences.chinese: 我攢了足夠的錢買一艘船和五十張蝦網。

sentences.english: Sometimes we‘d have to save up days just for an ice cream cone.
sentences.chinese: 有時我們爲了買個冰淇淋蛋卷就要攢好幾天的錢。

sentences.english: My mother taught us always to save some money for a rainy day.
sentences.chinese: 母親總是告誡我們要攢一些錢以備不時之需。

sentences.english: They fail to set aside enough for retirement.
sentences.chinese: 他們不能爲退休攢足夠的錢。

sentences.english: By squirreling away his pocket money for several months, the boy was able to buy his own radio .
sentences.chinese: 這孩子攢了幾個月的零錢，現在他能買一個收音機了。
